text:
Don Carlos Resort Opens The Doors Of Its Newly Renovated and Exclusive Orange Beach Club
Orange, the exclusive Beach Club, starts the season with a new name and image, offering a unique experience to its visitor: relaxing music, delicious Mediterranean dishes, cocktails and an incredible sea view.
The Hotel Don Carlos Leisure Resort & Spa has re-opened this summer season its exclusive and newly renovated Orange Beach Club. The establishment, known for being one of the most premium places in Marbella, has renovated its beach club with the el enlargement and redesign of the swimming pool and the addition of the exclusive VIP area. This area has now 695sqm for adult use only with hammocks to enjoy a full day on the beach.
Orange, also offers a new gastronomical experience: a new menu completely renovated, with a strong marine accent, focusing on fish, rice and local dishes. To be enjoyed, dishes such as fish stock rice with lobster or creamy rice with langoustines. The menu also incudes a refreshing cocktail selection like the Raspblue, the Fruity Beach or the house special: the Orange Beach Club.
Don Carlos Leisure Resort & Spa is an exclusive 5 star resort located in the heart of the Costa del Sol. The resort offers three unique and exclusive accommodation options: the Don Carlos, the Deluxe Villas by Don Carlos and The Oasis by Don Carlos, in addition to a varied restaurant, leisure activities and sport facilities.
Hotel Don Carlos is an exclusive relaxing spot to be enjoyed by both, couples and families. Exclusivity and distinction are the base of Deluxe Villas by Don Carlos, the most exquisite luxury apartments in Marbella offering a private atmosphere and a superior class service. Rest and wellbeing for your body and mind take a new meaning at The Oasis by Don Carlos. A bubble of luxury wellness and design where every corner and little detail are taken care of with extreme indulgence.
A sophisticated spa, 4 magnificent swimming pools, a unique Beach Club, 5 different restaurants and more than 40.000sqm of exuberant tropical gardensâ€¦ the Don Carlos Resort offers all of these and much more so your dream holidays can come true.
Source:- IAGTO
